amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 531 which prohibits funds in the bill from being used for the development of the MAX-HR project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 531 from the bill. Section 531 prohibits use of funds for the MAX HR project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCaul (TX) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 238 (Roll no. 480).
